LanguageData.USTox.Name: Utility Supplements (by Pelador)
LanguageData.USTox.DoStinkrootGas: Allow Stinkroot plants to spawn gas:
LanguageData.USTox.SRGasRadius: Stinkroot gas spawn radius of fully mature plant:
LanguageData.USTox.SRGasRadiusTip: Default value is [2]. (Only relevant if Stinkroot gas is allowed.)
LanguageData.USTox.StinkyTip: (Option changes to Stinkroot gas will only take effect after reloading RimWorld.)
LanguageData.USTox.DoTanglerootGas: Allow Tangleroot plants to spawn gas:
LanguageData.USTox.DoAcidWalls: Allow acid gas to attack adjacent edifices:
LanguageData.USTox.USToxLevelsTip: Default value is [100]. (Effective level of toxins as a percentage.)
LanguageData.USTox.ResTip: Note these changes will only take effect when RimWorld is restarted.
LanguageData.USTox.ResWarn: (Warning: increasing the % will mean research will become incomplete using the previous value.)
